response.improvementExplanation: The current data format being used is text file (CSV). Switching to an optimized serialized format like Parquet or ORC can improve performance by providing better compression, faster reads/writes, and query optimization through predicate pushdown.
response.benefits: Switching to Parquet or ORC format can lead to faster reads/writes, efficient storage due to columnar storage, better compression, and improved query performance through predicate pushdown.
